Articles.Content:
Bomber!!!!!! As with my other thread, I am preparing for a battle with friends and I wanted a supersonic bomb truck.

MOD List:

B9 Aerospace - [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92630-0-90-B9-Aerospace-Release-5-2-8-%28updated-30-12-14%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92630-0-90-B9-Aerospace-Release-5-2-8-%28updated-30-12-14%29)

B9 Procedural Parts - [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/104966-0-90-B9-Aerospace-Procedural-Parts-0-33-Updated-07-02-15](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/104966-0-90-B9-Aerospace-Procedural-Parts-0-33-Updated-07-02-15)

BD Armory - [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85209-0-25-BDArmory-v0-7-1-1-Dev-Thread-Dec-9](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85209-0-25-BDArmory-v0-7-1-1-Dev-Thread-Dec-9)

Mk2 Lightning Cockpit - [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/96766](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/96766)

Adjustable Landing Gear - [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/99660](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/99660)
